price: Àlùmísìkí ni (òórùn) ìparí rẹ̀. Kí àwọn alápàáǹtètè ṣàpáǹtètè nínú ìyẹn.
arabic: خِتَٰمُهُۥ مِسۡكٞۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلۡيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلۡمُتَنَٰفِسُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: khitāmuhu mis'kun wafī dhālika falyatanāfasi al-mutanāfisūna
